sn37.31:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
sn37.31:4.3: Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.
sn37.31:4.4: It is not because of the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, or children that females, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
sn37.31:4.5: It is because of the power of ethical behavior that females, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
sn37.31:4.6: These are the five powers of a female.”
